messages.title: Ivan Lewis, The Strongest Voice For Bury South
messages.content: We can’t afford a Tory landslide on 8th June. With no effective opposition, there will be nothing to stop a rampant Tory government: Starving the NHS of the money it needs, slashing funding for schools and colleges, scrapping the triple lock on pensions, imposing a dementia tax and removing the winter fuel allowance for 10 million of our elderly citizens. I am seeking your support again at this election because Bury South needs a strong Labour voice in Westminster to oppose the Tories every step of the way. Please give me the chance to continue that fight for you.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support the regeneration of our local town centres
Work with Radcliffe Primary Schools and the local community to open a new High School in the town
Fight the closure of Prestwich Walk-In Centre and campaign for fair funding from the government for the NHS, schools and colleges
End the 21st Century scandal of people living and sleeping on our streets
Continue to provide a full-time constituency information, advice and advocacy service
